alfredsnippet.snippet:
Tavris, Carol and Elliot Aronson, Mistakes Were Made (but not by me), A Harvest Book, Harcourt, Inc., 2007, p.46

"Unfortunately, they [scientists] are also more likely to think they don't [have blind spots], which makes them even more vulnerable to being hooked."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Scientists Are More Likely to Think They Don't Have Blind Spots
